name: sitemap-generator
title: Sitemap Generator
description: Create XML sitemaps from URL lists for search engine optimization
content:
Overview

This application generates valid XML sitemaps from a list of URLs using Python's xml.etree module. Sitemaps help search engines discover and index your website pages more efficiently.

Features

  • Generate sitemap.org protocol compliant XML
  • Configurable priority and change frequency
  • Automatic lastmod date stamping
  • Pretty-printed, readable XML output
  • Supports comments (lines starting with #) in URL list

Parameters

  • Input URL List: Upload a text file with one URL per line
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output
  • Priority: Default priority for URLs (0.0-1.0)
  • Change Frequency: How often pages change (weekly, daily, etc.)

Output

The application generates an XML sitemap file named sitemap.xml ready for submission to search engines.

Use Cases

  • SEO optimization for websites
  • Submitting site structure to search engines
  • Improving site indexation
  • Creating dynamic sitemaps from URL databases
command: rm -rf prod_apps || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python "$REPO_DIR/python/sitemap_generator.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -n "${outputName}" -p ${priority} -f "${changeFreq}"
